changeSet.author: rowanpi
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE AuditRevision CHANGE COLUMN id id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT;

changeSet.author: rowanpi
changeSet.sql:
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS AuditRevision_BEFORE_INSERT/ CREATE DEFINER = CURRENT_USER TRIGGER AuditRevision_BEFORE_INSERT BEFORE INSERT ON AuditRevision FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF ISNULL(NEW.server_uuid) THEN SET NEW.server_uuid = @@server_uuid; END IF; END/
